pyGXrender / gximagecomputing
  • SDK API (Programmatic Rendering)
  • View page source

SDK API (Programmatic Rendering)

The SDK layer provides typed option/result objects for application integration without argparse.Namespace coupling.

class gximagecomputing.sdk.ObserverOverrides(dsun_cm=None, lonc_deg=None, b0sun_deg=None)[source]

Bases: object

Optional observer metadata overrides applied before rendering.

  • lonc_deg (float | None)

  • b0sun_deg (float | None)

b0sun_deg: float | None

gximagecomputing.sdk.render_mw_maps(options)[source]

Render microwave maps programmatically without argparse/CLI overhead.

Returns a typed MWRenderResult.

Parameters:

options (MWRenderOptions)

Return type:

MWRenderResult
